alert.note: Alert for Elliott; Lee; Magoffin; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Powell, southeastern Montgomery, Morgan, Menifee, northwestern Magoffin, northeastern Lee, southeastern Rowan, Wolfe and southwestern Elliott Counties through 1000 PM EDT... At 915 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Means to Haystack to Fixer. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Tabor and Red River Gorge around 920 PM EDT. Frenchburg, Pomeroyton, High Falls, Stoll, Denniston, Valeria, Mariba, Mary and Flat around 925 PM EDT. Campton, Wellington, Ezel, Ratlitt, Vortex, Artville, Korea, Calaboose, Maytown and Lane around 930 PM EDT. Omer, Big Woods, Trent, Stillwater, Landsaw, Scranton, Baptist, Pekin, Dan and New Cummer around 935 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Henry, Lower Gilmore, Woodsbend, Daysboro, Twentysix, Dehart, Licking River, Hazel Green, Bangor, Gilmore, West Liberty, Sellars, Pomp, Lick Branch, Leisure, Payton, Blaze, Helechawa, Paragon, Lizzielane, Lewis, Caney, Lenox, Steele, Holliday, Blairs Mills, Stacy Fork, Cannel City, Lykins, Wrigley, Williams, Elkfork, Lytten, White Oak, Harper, Wonnie, Bethanna, Jeptha, Cottle and Minor. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elliott; Lee; Magoffin; Menifee; Montgomery; Morgan; Powell; Rowan; Wolfe
